FuncDef: This command configures the flow-label and optional mask match condition.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the flow label to be used as a match criterion. Value can be expressed as a decimal integer, as well as in hexadecimal or binary format. The following value shows decimal integer format only. Values-0 to 1048575.

Specifies the flow label mask value for this policy IPv6 Filter entry. Value can be expressed as a decimal integer, as well as in hexadecimal or binary format. The following value shows decimal integer format only. Values-0 to 1048575.
